title: EU Elevation Module
description: Administrate dynamic 3D Terrain Providers for your digital twin. Generate new quantized meshes from raw data or register existing external services to visualize them instantly in the Unified Viewer.
howToUse1: 1. This module globally registers a new layer type in the Unified Viewer. Once activated, a new "3D Terrain" selector will appear in the right contextual panel of the map.
howToUse2: 2. By default, the map runs in "Auto" mode. As you navigate the map, the module dynamically searches the list below for a terrain source whose "Bounding Box" contains the camera position.
howToUse3: 3. You can manually forcefully enable/disable terrain or pick a specific data source from the selector regardless of location.
howToUse4: 4. Use the "Add Terrain Source" button to register URLs pointing to your own pre-generated Cesium Terrain Providers globally.
howToUse5: 5. To automatically generate and ingest fresh quantized mesh terrain from any WCS endpoint (like IGN-Spain) or local GeoTIFF file, use the "Run Ingestion Pipeline" dashboard on the right.
errNoSource: Provide at least one source URL
errNoFile: Please select a file to upload
ingestionDesc: Enqueue Quantized Mesh processing for a specific region.
terrainSelectDesc: Select the active elevation provider for the 3D globe.
